description: Archive 4 MCP servers (coderef, hello-world, scriptboard, chrome-devtools) that are no longer needed. Consolidate MCP ecosystem to focus on: personas, coderef-context, coderef-docs, and coderef-workflow.
goal: Remove deprecated MCP servers from auto-loading configuration and archive their directories to clean up the MCP ecosystem
requirements: Update all namespace references in settings and commands if needed
